translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なあ……石丸……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey... Ishimaru...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいよな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聞く必要ねぇってか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No need to ask, huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前なら、そう言うんだろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it were you, you'd say that, wouldn't you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の日――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、昨日は黒部を仲間に出来なかったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, since I couldn't recruit Kurobe yesterday,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また今日は再挑戦に行こうかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: perhaps I'll try again today..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつが仲間になれば便利だもんなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He'd be convenient if he became an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、男だからどうでもいいような……むむ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since he's a guy, I don't really care that much... hmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、大変です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lance-sama, it's terrible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong?"
"K-Ku, ku, ku..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部さんが来ています！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kurobe-san is here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう2300年も昔の話――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a story from 2300 years ago—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石丸との一騎打ちに敗れた黒部は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After losing a duel against Ishimaru,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早朝から石丸の城の前に居座っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe had been sitting in front of Ishimaru's castle since early morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王としての風格すら漂わせながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exuding even the dignity of a Youkai King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 堂々と座り込む黒部を前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he sat proudly, and before Kurobe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の者達は皆が遠巻きに眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the castle inhabitants watched from a distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たな……石丸」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've come... Ishimaru."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城から出てくる『石丸』を見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing 'Ishimaru' coming out of the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が頬を歪めて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe twisted his face into a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たな……ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've come... Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城から出てくる『ランス』を見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing 'Lance' coming out of the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が頬を歪めて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe twisted his face into a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、朝っぱらから人ん家の前で何してんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, what are you doing in front of someone's house so early in the morning?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、えっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、黒部が座ったまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, while still seated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地につきそうなほど深く頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe lowered his head so deeply it nearly touched the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「『石丸』！　お前の強さに惚れた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ishimaru! I've fallen for your strength!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日、今、この瞬間より！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, right now, this very moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はお前の部下となる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will become your subordinate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか、この俺を便利に使ってやってくれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, make good use of me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然の言葉に『ランス』が驚愕した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance was astonished by the sudden words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにぃ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下になる為にこんな早朝から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To become a subordinate, he was sitting here from this early morning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の前で座り込みしとったのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sitting in front of the house..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大昔の古〜〜〜いノリを感じる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel the vibe of a really ancient old-fashioned style."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下になろうってんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He wants to become a subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最低限の礼儀だろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the minimum courtesy, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日から俺はお前さんの部下になる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, I will be your subordinate..."
"However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはお前が俺より強かったからだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's because you were stronger than me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし、弱音を吐いたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you ever complain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めたり、情けねえ姿を見せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: give up, or show a pathetic side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を幻滅させるようなことがあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and disappoint me in such a way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺がテメェを噛み殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will bite you to death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ！　それでも俺を部下にするか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How about that! Still want to make me your subordinate!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「答えろ！　石丸！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Answer me! Ishimaru!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe had been sitting in front of Ishimaru's castle since early morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が頬を歪めて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe twisted his face into a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たな……ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've come... Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城から出てくる『ランス』を見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing 'Lance' coming out of the castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が頬を歪めて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe twisted his face into a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、朝っぱらから人ん家の前で何してんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, what are you doing in front of someone's house so early in the morning?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、えっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、黒部が座ったまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, while still seated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地につきそうなほど深く頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe lowered his head so deeply it nearly touched the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「『石丸』！　お前の強さに惚れた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ishimaru! I've fallen for your strength!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日、今、この瞬間より！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, right now, this very moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はお前の部下となる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will become your subordinate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか、この俺を便利に使ってやってくれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, make good use of me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然の言葉に『ランス』が驚愕した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance was astonished by the sudden words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにぃ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下になる為にこんな早朝から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To become a subordinate, he was sitting here from this early morning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の前で座り込みしとったのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sitting in front of the house..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大昔の古〜〜〜いノリを感じる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel the vibe of a really ancient old-fashioned style."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下になろうってんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He wants to become a subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最低限の礼儀だろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the minimum courtesy, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日から俺はお前さんの部下になる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From today, I will be your subordinate..."
"However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはお前が俺より強かったからだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's because you were stronger than me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もし、弱音を吐いたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you ever complain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めたり、情けねえ姿を見せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: give up, or show a pathetic side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を幻滅させるようなことがあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and disappoint me in such a way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺がテメェを噛み殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will bite you to death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ！　それでも俺を部下にするか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How about that! Still want to make me your subordinate!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「答えろ！　石丸！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Answer me! Ishimaru!"
